periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 70, with temperatures rising to around 73 overnight. Southwest wind around 2 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between noon and 4pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 90, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4am. Partly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 72 overnight. South southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Sunday
